title: Hii, My pixel 2 had drained and went off. There is A red light which flashes when I press anything. I had read a few columns which stated that the phone should be kept on charge for an hour before it can restart. I have kept it on charge for several hours, however it still refuses to come on. Do let me know what can be done.
content: Kept on charge for 1+ hours and Manual Restart by holding the power and button for more than 5 seconds
